trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA802_00786_SEQ_00<tab>Ivaurault has information to share regarding your investigation.
TEXT_GAIUSA802_00786_SEQ_01<tab>Ivaurault reveals that he has also seen the winged eyeball. The sighting took place at the rocky area to the west. Take yourself there and investigate.
TEXT_GAIUSA802_00786_SEQ_02<tab>Instead of the winged eyeball, a monstrous banemite appears, and you are forced to defend yourself. Return to Fallgourd Float and report to Ivaurault.

TEXT_GAIUSA802_00786_SEQ_03<tab>You learn that the banemite you slew had long been a scourge upon the locals. While Ivaurault is duly impressed with your skill at arms, he wonders whether he only imagined seeing the winged eyeball.
TEXT_GAIUSA802_00786_IVAURAULT_000_000<tab>There is something you should know. I have been keeping this to myself, lest I worsen Medrod's paranoia, but I, too, have seen the winged eyeball.

TEXT_GAIUSA802_00786_IVAURAULT_000_001<tab>I cannot say whether it was coincidence, but my sighting took place precisely the same time as Medrod's. I was heading home after a day of digging when a shadow fell over me.

TEXT_GAIUSA802_00786_IVAURAULT_000_002<tab>Looking up, I found myself locked in a gaze with a giant eyeball. I let out a scream at the top of my lungs and ran without once looking back. This happened at the rocky area west of here, in case you had a mind to investigate.
TEXT_GAIUSA802_00786_DUMMY_000_010<tab>(/lookout at rocky area and slay the spider that pops.)
TEXT_GAIUSA802_00786_IVAURAULT_000_020<tab>A monstrous banemite appeared...and you slew it!? That creature had long been a scourge upon the folk of Fallgourd!
TEXT_GAIUSA802_00786_IVAURAULT_000_021<tab>Intentional or no, you have done us a great service. You have my gratitude!
TEXT_GAIUSA802_00786_IVAURAULT_000_022<tab>...But this does make me wonder, was it truly a winged eyeball I saw? Or merely a trick of light combined with blind panic?
